backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining types (SubjectScores, AcademicEntry, CodingChallenge, etc.) and implementing academic tracking, coding challenges, user profiles, access control, and data export/import functionality with persistent storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: displaying average percentage alongside raw marks in Subject Analysis view (REQ-1) and changing Mathematics to elective for Commerce subgroups in marks entry form (REQ-2).
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-existing summaries of frontend components including App.tsx, hooks, and UI components for academic tracking, coding practice, authentication, and data management with theme support.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, viewport configuration, and root div for mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component managing authentication via Internet Identity, profile setup flow, admin detection, module navigation (academic/coding/data/users), and theme provider integration.
frontend/src/components/AcademicModule.t: Academic module container with four-tab interface (Add Marks, View Progress, Subject Analysis, 9-Scale Grades) that switches to Progress View after successful mark submission.
frontend/src/components/AddMarksForm.tsx: Form for adding academic entries with grade/term/stream/subgroup selection, subject-specific marks input, real-time 9-scale preview, letter grade calculation, PE as universal elective, and Mathematics as elective for Commerce subgroups (CEBA/CEBA-CS).
frontend/src/components/CodingEditor.tsx: React component providing a Python code editor with challenge selection, code execution via Pyodide, output display, and ability to save coding attempts with scores to the backend.
frontend/src/components/CodingHistory.ts: Displays a list of saved coding attempts in an accordion format, showing challenge titles, timestamps, scores, code snippets, and execution results retrieved from the backend.
frontend/src/components/CodingModule.tsx: Tab-based container component that switches between the CodingEditor (for writing code) and CodingHistory (for viewing past attempts) views.
frontend/src/components/DataManagement.t: Provides data export (JSON/CSV) and import functionality for academic entries and coding attempts, with admin-only access control and drag-and-drop file upload support.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and attribution to caffeine.ai with an animated heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Navigation header with module switcher (Academic/Coding/Users/Data), theme toggle, and Internet Identity authentication login/logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/NineScaleGradesV: Displays academic subject grades converted to a 9-scale system with filtering by grade level, section, and term, showing grade cards with color-coded badges and marks.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: A form component that allows users to set up their profile by entering their name, using the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation hook and displaying toast notifications for success/error states.
frontend/src/components/ProgressView.tsx: Displays academic progress with filtering (grade, section, term), sorting, and visualizations including charts for grade trends, board exam results, and grade aggregates. Shows detailed academic entries in a sortable table with letter grades and percentages.
frontend/src/components/SubjectAnalysisV: Analyzes academic performance by subject with filtering options (grade, section, term), calculating statistics (average, highest, lowest marks) per subject and displaying results in tables and bar charts.
frontend/src/components/UserManagement.t: Admin component for assigning user roles (user or admin) by entering a Principal ID, using the useAssignUserRole mutation hook with form validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality, managing AuthClient lifecycle, identity state, and login status with support for delegation identity validation.
frontend/src/hooks/usePyodide.ts: Custom hook that loads and manages Pyodide (Python runtime in browser), providing a runPython function to execute Python code and capture stdout/stderr output with singleton instance management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, academic entries, board exam results, coding challenges, and admin operations using the ICP actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components, charts, and sidebar elements using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/lib/boardExam.ts: Provides utilities for Grade 10 board exam calculations, including AI subject substitution logic that replaces the lowest core subject (Math/Science/Social) if AI score is higher.
frontend/src/lib/gradeCalculation.ts: Contains functions to calculate letter grades (A+ to F) and 9-scale grades from percentage scores, plus helper functions for percentage calculation and grade color styling.
frontend/src/lib/maxMarks.ts: Defines grade-wise maximum marks rules for different subjects (regular, Computer, AI) across grades 1-12, including board exam configurations and fallback logic for subject-specific max marks.
frontend/src/lib/percent.ts: Utility functions for percentage calculations including clamping values to 0-100 range, formatting percentages, and calculating percentage from marks.
frontend/src/lib/subjectAnalysis.ts: Computes subject-wise statistics (average, highest, lowest) from academic entries, calculating percentages using grade-specific max marks with fallback logic for missing or invalid data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH variables, container settings, border radius, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state tracking two completed features: displaying average percentages in subject analysis and changing Mathematics to elective for Commerce subgroups (CEBA/CEBA-CS). Contains metadata for an academic grading application with version 3 state.
